tool.name: Extract Sequence Subset
tool.description: Extracts sequence based on either taxonomy or OTU numbers from the LCA/QIIME identifications.
tool.help:
**Description**
This tool will filter out sequences based on either OTU numbers or taxonomy and write them to file either just as sequence ids or including the sequence information in a fasta file.
Takes a otu mapping file (qiimeotu) and a fasta file or index fasta file. Depending on the format of the file containing the sequences (fasta, index) the script will accordingly extract any sequence matching to either the otu number or taxonomy. This script will not create an index automatically unless the index flag is specified.
----
**Inputs and Outputs**
- Inputs: + Fasta file or Index Fasta file + OTU Mapping file (quiimeotu)
- Ouput: + Extracted Seqs + Index Fasta file
-----
**Author**
